mapper.select: SELECT id, first_name AS firstName, last_name AS lastName, initial, color, password, email FROM users
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (id, first_name, last_name, initial, color, password, email) VALUES (#{id}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{initial}, #{color}, #{password}, #{email});
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, initial = #{initial}, color = #{color}, password = #{password}, email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id};
